attributes.action: get job seekers to work with businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: get job seekers to work with businesses and get people into work by contacting high street shops and companies and get people a stable job, not just trials and part time work, people want a permament job!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign an existing petition:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/jobhelp/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
